allow: Bash(else echo "❌ 需要安装依赖")

Bash(git commit -m "chore: initial commit - AI Travel Planner with multi-model support

✨ Features:
- Multi AI model support (Claude Haiku 4.5, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, DeepSeek Chat)
- Voice input for travel planning
- Intelligent itinerary generation
- User authentication with Supabase
- Trip management and detailed view
- Cost estimation

🛠️ Tech Stack:
- Next.js 15 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Supabase (Auth + Database)
- Anthropic Claude API + DeepSeek API
- Web Speech API

📝 Documentation:
- Complete setup guide
- Model selection documentation
- Contributing guidelines
- Security policy")
